org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeAbstractAttachmentManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeManagerAdapter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeAbstractAttachmentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAttachmentManager, IAeManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeFileAttachmentManager
public abstract class AeAbstractAttachmentManager
extends AeManagerAdapter
implements IAeAttachmentManager

Abstract base class for attachment managers.

getGroupId

protected long getGroupId(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer)
Returns the group id from the first attachment in the given container.

Parameters:
aContainer -
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the container is empty.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the container contains attachments from multiple groups.

getProcessId

protected long getProcessId(IAeAttachmentContainer aContainer)
Returns the process id from the first attachment in the given container.

Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the container is empty.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the container contains attachments from multiple processes.
